description:
Given an array A[] of N positive integers having all the numbers occurring exactly three times, except for one number which will occur only once. Find the number occurring only once.

```

Input:

N = 10

A = {12, 1, 12, 3, 12, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3}

Output: 2

Explanation: 

Since 2 occurs once, while
other numbers occur thrice, 
2 is the answer.

Constraints:

4 <   N  <= 2 * 10^5

0 <= A[i] <= 10^9
```
title: One in three
